eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.


Example uses:
- Floating objects, such as powerups or coins
- Moveable platforms
- Enemy movement patterns

Properties:
- Horizontal distance
- Vertical distance
- Horizontal speed
- Vertical speed
- Center of movement, X position
- Center of movement, Y position

Tips:
- For circular or elliptical movement, the horizontal and vertical speed need to be the same
- For horizontal movement only, set vertical distance to 0
- For vertical movement only, set horizontal distance to 0
- For figure-8 movement, set horizontal speed to 1/2 of the vertical speed
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SineMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave.

Example uses:
- Floating pickups
- Moveable platforms
- Enemy movement

Properties:
- Center of movement, X position
- Center of movement, Y position
- Horizontal distance
- Vertical distance
- Horizontal speed
- Horizontal distance

Tips:
- For circular or elliptical movement, the horizontal and vertical speed need to be the same
- For horizontal movement, set vertical distance to 0
- For vertical movement, set horizontal distance to 0
- For figure-8 movement, set horizontal speed to 1/2 of the vertical speed
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SineMovement

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is verified.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Checkbox
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Checkbox can be toggled by a left-click or touch. 

When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is TRUE.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Checkbox

events.comment: Fix inputs that create malformed checkboxes
Change shape painter based on properties
Set halo radius, if not specified

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.

You can [watch this tutorial](https://youtu.be/iiTUwdAT_hs) showing how to use this extension - remember to attach it to a **Shape Painter** object.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DraggableSliderControl
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users. 

The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DraggableSliderControl

events.comment: Use darker halo while being dragged
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw active track (2 pixels bigger than property)
Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height (to prevent track ends from showing)
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Allow an object to move in a rectangular pattern.
By default, movement will slow down when going around corners, but this can be changed to always use a constant speed.

Example uses:
- Moveable platforms
- Enemy movement patterns

Properties:
- Center of movement, X position
- Center of movement, Y position
- Horizontal distance
- Vertical distance
- Horizontal speed
- Vertical speed
- Use constant speed (object will not slow down at corners)
- Use counter-clockwise direction

Tips:
- Set the CenterX and CenterY values to move the object
- For horizontal movement only, set vertical distance to 0
- For vertical movement only, set horizontal distance to 0
- Use conditions to apply logic based on the direction the object is moving.  For example, setting the animation.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RectangularMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow an object to move in a rectangular pattern.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allow an object to move in a rectangular pattern.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RectangularMovement

events.comment: Horizontal movement is the same for both methods
Vertical movement is reversed based on the parameter
Skip if no horizontal movement is desired
Skip if no vertical movement is desired
Skip if no horizontal movement is desired
Skip if no vertical movement is desired
Reset the counter after the rectangular path is completed
Vertical movement is the same for both methods
Detect when Progress crosses 0 (or if horizontal movement is disabled)
Detect when Progress crosses 0 (or if vertical movement is disabled)
Set the center of movement to the initial location of the object
